meanings.definition: The location or piece of land where a home is built.
meanings.sent1: Our new homesite has a beautiful view of the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent showed us a few homesites near the lake.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel thought our homesite was a perfect spot for burying nuts.
meanings.sent4: In the vast forest, our homesite stood out like a tiny island in a sea of trees.
meanings.sent5: The homesite by the river was so peaceful, it felt like a dream come true.

meanings.definition: A website or online platform for buying, selling, or renting homes.
meanings.sent1: I found the perfect homesite to buy my first house.
meanings.sent2: The homesite had detailed listings of properties in the area.
meanings.sent3: The homesite crashed just when I was about to finalize my purchase!
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the homesite felt like exploring a digital neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The homesite's user-friendly interface made house hunting a breeze.
